parameters.subject: =Purchase Order from Opcommerce Online Pvt. Ltd. for Vedanta (Purchase Order #: {{$node["create po"].json["purchaseorder"]["purchaseorder_number"]}})
parameters.html:
=


Dear Sir/ Madam,

 

Please find attached herewith Purchase order for supply of mentioned material to our Client M/s Vedanta, {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["po_items"][0]["plant"]}} Plant. Request you to kindly go through the attached PO and provide your confirmation on price, terms, conditions, and delivery timeline by accepting the same.

 

You will be contacted by our representative (POC Name - {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["operation_agent"]["first_name"]}}, POC Email - {{$node["Get po_details"].json["data"][0]["operation_agent"]["email"]}}) from Operations team for co-ordination w.r.t material delivery, invoice provision and other assistance related to this supply.

 

 

 


http://shakedeal.com/

OP COMMERCE ONLINE PVT LTD 

DEDICATED PURCHASING PARTNER FOR:


​

Terms and conditions

  • In rare instances, if you have any concerns with respect to this, please reach out to us immediately.

  • We must be notified 4 hours before dispatch in order to generate ASN and Tax invoices, which are required for goods receipt and without which materials will not be allowed inside the Material gate by security. For order dispatch related queries E-mail to: vedantaiob.ops@shakedeal.com

  • Consignment should go only with OP commerce invoice.

  • For all other Terms and Conditions please refer our attached Purchase Order.

​
